**Reasoning:** In Scene A, there are two red balls on the left platform and two on the right platform. The left side has a blue square hanging above it which will fall due to gravity. This blue square will create a gap when it falls, allowing the red ball on the left platform to potentially slide down onto the horizontal surface below. From there, if the horizontal surface is aligned correctly, the red ball can roll towards the green target area. Similarly, the red ball on the right platform might also be able to slide down once the blue square falls off the edge. Given these possibilities, both red balls have a chance to reach the green target area.
